4	  coding viruses for the mind  if as some have suggested religions are viruses of the mind  then it might make sense to separate the components of any given religion into two parts  the first part being those things which are necessary to maintain viral infection and which assist in the infection of new hosts  the second part is the payload  those instructions which the virus writer wishes those who have been infected to carry out or execute  my hope is that this method of analysis will assist others in understanding the structure of existing religions as well as those who aim to write one from scratch
